messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Show on the Tokaido Road tonight.
messages.msgSnippet: GAK! I don t know what channel that s on for COX! I ll find it, don t worry. I ll record it too. ... Do you Yahoo!? Friends.  Fun. Try the all-new Yahoo!
messages.messageBody:
GAK! I don't know what channel that's on for COX! I'll find it, don't worry. I'll record it too.


---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Friends. Fun. Try the all-new Yahoo! Messenger

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Show on the Tokaido Road tonight.
messages.msgSnippet: History Channel International is having a program on tonight at 10pm EST and again at 2am EST on the Tokaido Road in Japan. This is the famous highway that ran
messages.messageBody:
History Channel International is having a program on tonight at 10pm
EST and again at 2am EST on the Tokaido Road in Japan. This is the
famous highway that ran between Edo/Tokyo and Kyoto. Just thought I'd
give everyone a heads up.

-MissBehavin
